instruction.value: for 4 doses.
DAY -1. BID for 3 days, starting the evening of chemotherapy. May be administered by PO route.
DAY 1 of 21. Administer 30 minutes prior to PACLitaxel.
DAY -1. Administer pre-chemotherapy. May be administered by PO route.
DAY 1. If oral anti-emetics have not been taken by patient as instructed, administer 30 to 60 minutes pre-chemotherapy. May be administered by PO route.
DAY 1. PRN. May be administered by PO route.
DAY 8. If oral anti-emetics have not been taken by patient as instructed, administer 30 to 60 minutes pre-chemotherapy. May be administered by PO route.
DAY 8. PRN. May be administered by PO route.
DAY 15. If oral anti-emetics have not been taken by patient as instructed, administer 30 to 60 minutes pre-chemotherapy. May be administered by PO route.
DAY 15. PRN. May be administered by PO route.
DAY 22. If oral anti-emetics have not been taken by patient as instructed, administer 30 to 60 minutes pre-chemotherapy. May be administered by PO route.
DAY 22. PRN. May be administered by PO route.
DAY 1 of 21. If oral anti-emetics have not been taken by patient as instructed, administer 30 to 60 minutes pre-chemotherapy. May be administered by PO route.
DAY 1 of 21. PRN. May be administered by PO route.
DAY 8 of 21. If oral anti-emetics have not been taken by patient as instructed, administer 30 to 60 minutes pre-chemotherapy. May be administered by PO route.
DAY 8 of 21. PRN. May be administered by PO route.
DAY 8 of 21. If oral anti-emetics have not been taken by patient as instructed, administer 30 to 60 minutes pre-gemcitabine. May be administered by PO route.
DAY 8 of 21. PRN. May be administered by IV route.
DAY 8 of 21. If oral anti-emetic has not been taken by patient as instructed, administer 30 to 60 minutes pre-gemcitabine. May be administered by PO route.
DAY 1 of 21. If oral anti-emetic has not been taken by patient as instructed, administer 30 to 60 minutes pre-gemcitabine. May be administered by PO route.
DAY 1 of 21. PRN. May be administered by IV route.
DAY 1 of 21. Administer 30 minutes prior to DOCEtaxel, if oral dexamethasone premedication has not been taken.
DAY 1 of 7. Administer 30 minutes prior to PACLitaxel.
DAYS 1, 2 & 3 of 21. If oral anti-emetics have not been taken by patient as instructed, administer 30 to 60 minutes pre-chemotherapy. May be administered by PO route.
DAYS 1, 2 & 3 of 21. PRN. May be administered by PO route.
DAY 1 of 28. If oral anti-emetics have not been taken by patient as instructed, administer 30 to 60 minutes pre-chemotherapy. May be administered by PO route.
DAY 1 of 28. PRN. May be administered by PO route.
DAYS 2, 3, 4 & 5 of 28. If oral dexamethasone has not been taken by patient as instructed, administer 30 to 60 minutes pre-chemotherapy. May be administered by PO route.
DAYS 2, 3, 4 & 5 of 28. PRN. May be administered by PO route.
DAY 8 of 28. If oral anti-emetics have not been taken by patient as instructed, administer 30 to 60 minutes pre-chemotherapy. May be administered by PO route.
DAY 8 of 28. PRN. May be administered by PO route.
DAY 1 of 21. If aprepitant was prescribed and not taken by patient as instructed, administer PRN. May be administered by PO route.
DAY 1 of 21. Administer prior to chemotherapy.
DAY 4 of 21. Administer pre-chemotherapy.
DAY 1 of 21. If oral dexamethasone has not been taken by patient as instructed, administer 30 minutes prior to DOCEtaxel.
DAY 1 of 21. May be administered by PO route.
